Package Character

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    The Character class is the parent class for Player and Enemy "speed" defines how fast the Charakter can move "pixsizex" and "pixsizey" define the size of the Character in Pixel which is important for drawing, but also for moving.
    Enemy
    The enemy class is the parent class for all AI controlled Characters When starting a level the Enemies can be spawned with the spawn() method at the spawnx,spawny position If an enemy dies it is simply removed from the game A thread calls the enemies AI every 100 milliseconds.
    Pathfinder
    The Pathfinder class seeks for the shortest path between two points on a quadratic grid.
    Player
    The Player class specifies the Player controlled Characters.
    Seeker
    Seeker Enemies search for the nearest Player Character and try to approach it They use a Pathfinder to get the shortest path to the Player If there exists no path or it is already very close, it just tries to move towards the Player When the Graphics of the Seeker and the Player overlap, the Seeker kills the Player
